Wallet as a small notebook: Write down important information, such as contact numbers or notes, on sticky notes and place them in your wallet for easy access.
Wallet as a keychain: Attach a keychain to your wallet to keep your keys together and prevent them from getting lost.
Wallet as a small first aid kit: Carry a small first aid kit in your wallet, including band-aids, antiseptic wipes, and a small tweezers, for minor injuries.
Wallet as a coin purse: Use your wallet to store loose change, preventing it from getting lost in your pocket.
Wallet as a small flashlight: Attach a small flashlight to your wallet, so you can have a light source readily available in case of an emergency.
